ygData.subject: Re: Tome of Magi Lore V1.1 **SPOILERS**
ygData.msgSnippet: Skull of Jhen Tra is Staff Skull found on Embalmers in Lake Rathetear.  You can also find the coveted Runed Totem staff on the Gnoll High Shamans there.
ygData.messageBody:
Skull of Jhen Tra is "Staff Skull" found on Embalmers in Lake
Rathetear. You can also find the coveted Runed Totem staff on the
Gnoll High Shamans there.

Ziffnab

--- Elkantar The Wizard <the_elkantar@...> wrote:
> From: "Elkantar The Wizard"
> <the_elkantar@...>
>
> (summery of this list)
> Date: Fri, 14 May 1999 21:15:58 GMT
> Mime-Version: 1.0
> Content-type: text/plain; format=flowed;
>
> Before you read this tome I would like a second or
> two to repy
> to an email I received about duplicate questions.
> Some people
> on this list are newer to the list and missed
> questions that
> were answered before. This is not a FAQ sheet or
> Board where
> the History is posted. So if I (Elkantar) ask a
> repeat question
> it is for this tome and is only asked because I have
> missed the
> question.
>
> It is my belief that magi(all casting classes)
> should be the
> knowledge base for the lore(history/myths) of the EQ
> world. So
> below is my growing list of summerized Q & A's from
> this list.
> Please feel free to use it to impress you friends.
> Remember
> we are wizards keeper of knowledge, destroyer of
> worlds.
>
> Items Info/Location
> ----------------------
> --------------------------------------------
> Black Flowing Robe Najena
> Blue Robe Erudin, Qeynos
> Brown/orange Robe Thaumaturgist Robe
> (befallen)
> Dingy White Robe Damask (befallen)
> Green Robe Felwithe
> Red Robe Erudin
> Violet Robe Freeport
> White Robe Gossimer (befallen)
> Yellow Robe Ak'anon (Though I think only
> gnomes can ware
> them).
> Staff Skull Gnoll Embalmbers
> (Necromancer Gnolls)
> Lake Rathe zone.
> Totem Staff Rex, the gnoll shaman of
> PAW.
> Cutthroat Ring on Dervish Cutthrouts.
> Slaver Keys Free slaves give copper to
> slaves located
> around the mine
> Backpacks(player made) Large Sewing Kint, High
> Quality pelt and
> backpack pattern.
>
> Senior Apprentice Robe +1 mana only no extra
> regeneration/+? AC
> Glowing Wooden Crook +5HP/+5M Magic wpn 19 Dmg.
> Dusty
> Bloodstained Gloves They can be found in UNrest
> as loot or
> can be baught for 50pp min.
> price.
> +25 mana, +2AC.
> Crookstinger(dagger) Crookstinger always seemed
> to be around
> the Orc Camp by the end of
> a path.
> Woven vs Netted armor They are equal in AC value
> but woven
> weighs less.
> Skull of Jhen Tra (UNKNOWN)
>
>
> Quests
> ----------------------
> Chanda Miller Bear Hide Armor. Killing Paw
> Gnolls and
> Bandits will raise faction
> with the
> Karana Residents. CAN be
> used by wizards.
>
>
> MISC
> ----------------------
> Class Specific Skills Evo, Channel, Div, Abj, Etc.
> = ((Level + 1) * 5)
> Offense = (Level * 4)
> Defense = ((Level * 4) + 1)
> Weapons Pierce, 2/1h Blunt = ((Level
> + 1)*3)
>
>
> Spells
> ----------------------
> Most Spells Found somewhere in the city
> of Erudin &
> Felwithe check every
> merchant.
> Pillar of Fire Located at Erudin Library or
> Research it.
> Root Max out Alteration and use
> on White con'd
> or below.
> Alter Plain of Hate 44 level spell for plane
> travel
> Alter Plain of Sky 44 level spell for plane
> travel
> Fire&Ice Remember that some monster
> while not
> affected by ice can be hurt
> by fire.
> Shock spells Do less damage then bolt but
> have better
> damage to mana ratio
> Bolt spells Do more damage cost more
> mana and must be
> aimed correctly
> Targeting When using AE or PE spells
> try to target
> your tank to avoid getting
> targeted
> Shieldskin Reagents are Cat's Eye
> Agate.
> Cast Force Reagents are Rune of
> Presence,
> Rune of Disassocation
> Fire Spiral of Al'Kabor Reagents are Rune of Nagafen
>
>
